mapper.insert: insert into branch_office (BHF_NM, BHF_ADRES, BHF_TELNO) values (#{bhf_nm}, #{bhf_adres}, #{bhf_telno})
mapper.select: select bhf_code, bhf_nm, bhf_telno from branch_office
select bhf_code, bhf_nm, bhf_telno from branch_office where BHF_NM like concat ('%',#{bhf_nm},'%')
select bhf_code from branch_office where bhf_code = ( select bhf_code from beacon where beacon_mjr = #{beacon_mjr} and beacon_mnr = #{beacon_mnr} )
select b.bhf_code, a.bhf_nm, sum(b.bill_totamt) as totalPrice from branch_office a, bill b where a.bhf_code = b.bhf_code group by bhf_code order by totalPrice desc limit 0,10;
